title: The Cell: a functioning structure. Pt. 1
creator_credit: CRM Educational Films and Steven Katten
brief_description: Uses cinemicroscopy and special-effects animation to present the cell as a functioning entity as well as a stable, reproducible structure. The key functions of DNA and protein enzymes are revealed along with the way cells obtain nourishment and includes a discussion on cellular reproduction and cell structure. Narrated and hosted by Dr David Suzuki.
